Name: Moons of Ardan
About the game: Moons of Ardan is a city-building and management game where you rebuild and expand your civilization across moons in a real-time simulated planetary system. You follow the Axonauts, the survivors of a generational ship that crashed on a lonely moon. In the crash, most of the technology that served them got lost. Help them restore their culture and reconnect with their homeworld by building a great wonder. Collect basic materials to build towns to provide shelter to your people. Collect resources and transform them to fulfil the peopleâ€™s basic needs but also their most luxurious whims. Balance the use of workers to create a powerful and efficient economy. Carefully lay an effective transporter network. Develop new technologies to uncover the space travel secret. Expand your empire in a real-time simulated planetary system. Create new colonies to exploit discovered materials desired by your high-level citizens. Create efficient trade routes to send resources to the most needed location. Push your people to build that awesome building and become the new master of space. A carefully handcrafted, real-time planetary system, centered around the gas giant Ardan, its 3 habitable moons and 4 asteroids. Great planetary views. Enjoy interesting challenges with the pollution system. Plant trees on your colonies with the brand new woodcutter system. 4 tiers of population progression. 45+ resources to collect and manage. Challenging production chains Gridless and organic city building. A space route system for resources to reach your inhabitants. A factory worker slot system to fine-tune your building outputs. Play at your own speed or even pause the game to plan your empire. Awesome tailor-made soundtrack. A basic tutorial system for players not used to this kind of game. Energy management. Challenging achievement system. Meaningful sustainability choices that make the game harder but with a more satisfying output. Animated build visuals. Photo mode. Localised pollution system
